Privacy

No annoying cookies or pop-up windows.

I respect your privacy.

I don't make money from this website or any of its content. It's an ad free and cookie free space.

To keep it running smoothly I use Statcounter. It's a web analytics service that provides me with me some statistics about visits to this site. This service provides aggregate data, which means, I don't collect any personal information about you from this service.

I encourage you to view Statcounter's privacy policy if you're concerned about how this service works and what data it collects.

Some of the links on this site will take you to websites with different privacy policies to which you will be subject to. I take no reponsiblity for them.

If you contact me, I'll not share your email with any other individuals, businesses or organizations.

If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, or any other privacy-related issues that are important to you, please get in touch.

Last updated: Friday, October 16, 2020.

About this Site

I hand coded this site using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It's powered by Eleventy and Netlify. All visuals, unless stated otherwise, are mine. All views expressed here are my own. I respect your privacy. Thanks for dropping by!
